name: Z-Wave
description:
Z-Wave is a game where you are alone and there are zombies trying to kill you. The big zombies has more health then the small ones. There are 10 sec between every wave. It gets harder and harder for every wave. You are also equipped with: 1 glock and 1 ak-47. 

CREDITS:

Music:

Sebastian.

Code:

Sebastian, Johan.

Modeling/texture:
